rooms.description: Entrance hall with Vastu oriented entrance to ensure positive energy flow and ease of access.
Spacious living area designed in Scandinavian minimalist style featuring natural lighting and clean lines, aligned according to Vastu principles for harmonious energy.
Open dining space integrated with the living room, promoting family interaction while adhering to Vastu guidelines ensuring proper placement relative to cardinal directions.
Multi-functional room for joint family gatherings and leisure activities; includes built-in storage and flexible seating arrangements.

Modern Scandinavian kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, ample counter space, and a layout that aligns with Vastu principles by placing it in the southern part of the house for positive energy flow.
Accessible washroom adjacent to the kitchen area for convenience, designed with minimalistic fixtures.
Central courtyard serving as a transitional space between outdoor and indoor areas; integrates natural elements in line with Vastu's open space requirements.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned for auspicious entry, promoting positive energy flow according to Vastu.
Large window in the living area for abundant natural light and fresh air, ensuring a balance of elements.
